alert.note: Alert for Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 31 at 2:18PM MDT until March 31 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 18 to 28 inches possible. * WHERE...Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 PM MDT this evening. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Sunday afternoon through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected on all mountain routes. Travel may be quite difficult at times. Traction restrictions are also possible. Those with travel plans through any mountain routes through the western Uintas should be prepared for severe winter driving conditions Sunday night through Tuesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
